item.title: MIUI OS1.0.17.0.UNJCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Civi 4 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 4 Pro China

Codename: chenfeng

Version: OS1.0.17.0.UNJCNXM | 14.0

Size: 8.7 GB

MD5: b27884e0739676a5de81b53f69c7b053

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to October 2024. Increased system security.
[Screen Time]
Fix: On rare occasions, time stats weren't displayed in Screen time

Download: Here
